casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Brian Jay HOFFMANN, Appellant. WD 79985 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: October 31, 2017
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied December 4, 2017 Ellen Flottman, Columbia, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Richard Starnes, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Two: Anthony Rex Gabbert, P.J., Thomas H. Newton, and Gary D. Witt, JJ.

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Mr. Brian Jay Hoffmann appeals his conviction by a Buchanan County jury for four counts of child molestation in the first degree. He was sentenced to forty-five years in prison.

For reasons stated in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 30.25(b).
